data.name: FIREFIGHT RELOADED
data.detailed_description:
Notes

Multiplayer is currently in a work-in-progress state, but it is available for testing. Post bugs in the discussions if you see them.

Players can optionally switch to older versions of the mod with the "unsupported" beta branch.


About the Game


FIREFIGHT RELOADED is a Half-Life 2 modification which
combines fast-paced, horde mode gameplay with gameplay features and customization from other Source modifications such as SMOD.

  • Fast-paced gameplay similar to old school FPS games.
  • Blends in gameplay elements inspired by other Source mods, like kicking, aiming down sights, bullettime and more.
  • Players can customize almost everything about the game, from changing how enemy spawners work to how much speed the player walks at.
  • Endless horde mode-style gameplay.
  • Fight vicious enemies from the past, present and future such as Bullsquids, Houndeyes, Hunters, the Cremator and the Combine Female Assassin, along with new encounters such as the Combine Ace.
  • A variety of weapons from a Crowbar to a OICW, along with the ability to add in up to 30 custom weapons.
  • A in-game store that allows you to buy weapons, ammo, and supplies with in-game currency that you get by killing hordes of enemies.
  • A brutal gore system that allows you to shred enemies with your Shotgun and RPG.
  • A whole host of add-ons and custom content created by other players on the Steam Workshop.
  • Multiplayer Co-Op (Alpha) with up to 6 players.
  • Free regular updates which add new content and features to the mod.
  • Players can optionally switch to older versions of the mod with the "unsupported" beta branch.
  • Open Source! More info here: https://gitlab.com/Cobalt-57/FIREFIGHT-RELOADED-src-sdk-2013

data.short_description: Welcome to FIREFIGHT RELOADED, where the greatest warrior is determined by how many enemies they kill. Customize your experience with loads of countless options to choose from. Use your quick movement and overpowered footwear to be the best in the battlefield.
data.reviews:
“Killing dudes while listening to podcasts has never been so laid back.”
Manwich (Player)

“Jesus Christ this is insanity. Always fun having Combine Firefight going on Lockdown. Really makes you feel like you are in Nova Prospekt with all the Combine and Syths going around.”
Vankoovur (Player)

“Its a good game and its fun.”
bfbc2143 (Player)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 (32/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 Processor (3.0GHz, or better)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8.1 level Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 8.1
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: May have slight lag issues on low-end PCs due to the amount of enemies on-screen. Internet connection required for Multiplayer component.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 (32/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Processor (3.0GHz, or better)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c level Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required for Multiplayer component.

content_descriptors.notes: FIREFIGHT RELOADED, despite it being a Half-Life 2 modification, includes much more violence and gore than in the original game, including decapitations and dismemberment. These new effects can be disabled in the "ADVANCED OPTIONS" menu if you do not wish to see these.
